channel.title: How do i use delays in delta?
channel.description:
hey guys i need to delay something on my server(a teleport) the code is like toX = absX + 0; toY = absY + 2; so how do make it delay the going to the Y position do i do like this? toXDelay = -number- ??
i am trying to make the climb over the nets at gnome agility course 100% correct

item.title: How do i use delays in delta?
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“staticfish1, post:2, topic:399742”]Put pEmote under toY = ####. Like so:

toX = ####;
toY = ####;
pEmote = 0x###;

The pEmote should delay it.[/quote]
no it just made the guy do an emote afterwards lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do i use delays in delta?

item.title: How do i use delays in delta?
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Put pEmote under toY = ####. Like so:

toX = ####;
toY = ####;
pEmote = 0x###;

The pEmote should delay it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i use delays in delta?
